duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop Anaplan models and applications to meet business requirements.
Maintain and optimize Anaplan models for performance and usability.
Utilize Anaplan's modeling and development tools such as Anaplan Connect, Anaplan Calculation Engine, and Shell Scripts.
Apply knowledge of financial planning and analysis processes and concepts in Anaplan development.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support business planning processes using Anaplan models.
Utilize SQL and other programming languages for data processing and integration.
Apply strong analytical and problem-solving skills in troubleshooting and optimizing Anaplan models.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
